content: I just wanted to take a moment to thank all of our wonderful GCI students. It was a very close race this year with outstanding efforts from @Chiranjiv Singh Malhi, @Thusal Ranawaka, @Yuhan L, BurningPhoenix, and Eryk Miko≈Çajek who all completed more than 10 tasks and were in contention for the grand prize.

I hope you all enjoyed getting introduced to Open Source and, of course, hope you will continue to work on BRL-CAD. It's a great way to learn, to prepare yourself for college, preparation for Google Summer of Code, real coding experience that will help you get a job, and can simply be a fun place to work on nearly any code projects that interest you.

Thank you! I think it's also worth mentioning that we couldn't have had better mentors, so thank you to all the mentors for your efforts too. Starting from not even knowing what CMake was, I really learned a lot of new things because of the mentors' help and advice :)

Thank you!
It was a pleasure to learn BRL-CAD and I enjoyed working with the mentors! :)
